sources.title: Swing Hostess
sources.description: Rags-to-riches-to-rags story features Benny Goodman vocalist Martha Tilton as an unemployed big band singer who takes a job as an operator at a jukebox company. After falling in love with a bandleader, she gets a chance to get back in the limelight by singing for his group.

sources.title: Swing Hostess (1944)
sources.description: An out-of-work band singer gets a job at a jukebox company and makes a hit. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/swing-hostess-1944/

sources.title: Swing Hostess (1944) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Martha Tilton, Iris Adrian, Charles Collins
Director: Sam Newfield

Rags-to-riches-to-rags story features Benny Goodman vocalist Martha Tilton as an unemployed big band singer who takes a job as an operator at a jukebox company. After falling in love with a bandleader, she gets a chance to get back in the limelight by singing for his group.

metadata.Plot: Rags-to-riches-to-rags story features Benny Goodman vocalist Martha Tilton as an unemployed big band singer who takes a job as an operator at a jukebox company. After falling in love with a bandleader, she gets a chance to get back in the limelight by singing for his group.
metadata.Actors: Martha Tilton, Iris Adrian, Charles Collins
